tools.name: get_machine_definition
tools.description: Get the current machine definition in both JSON and DSL format. Use this to understand the machine structure before making modifications.

format.description: Format to return: json (structured), dsl (DyGram source), or both

tools.name: update_definition
tools.description: Update the machine definition with a new structure. Accepts JSON format and automatically converts to DSL. Use get_machine_definition first to see current structure.

machine.description: Complete machine definition in JSON format with title, nodes, and edges

reason.description: Brief explanation of why the machine is being modified

tools.name: construct_tool
tools.description: Construct a new tool dynamically when one doesn't exist in code. Use this when you need a capability that isn't available.

description.description: Clear description of what the tool does

input_schema.description: JSON Schema defining the tool's input parameters

implementation_strategy.description: How to implement the tool: agent_backed (LLM executes), code_generation (generate code), composition (combine existing tools)

implementation_details.description: For agent_backed: prompt/instructions. For code_generation: JavaScript function code. For composition: JSON describing tool chain.

tools.name: list_available_tools
tools.description: List all available tools (both in-code and dynamically created)

tools.name: propose_tool_improvement
tools.description: Propose an improvement to an existing tool. Proposals are recorded for review.

tool_name.description: Name of the tool to improve

tools.name: get_tool_nodes
tools.description: Get all Tool nodes defined in the machine. Useful for finding loosely-defined tools that need to be built out.

include_registered.description: Include information about whether each tool is already registered dynamically

tools.name: build_tool_from_node
tools.description: Build and register a dynamic tool from a Tool node definition. Use this when you have a loosely-defined Tool node that needs to be completed and registered.

tool_name.description: Name of the Tool node to build from

input_schema.description: Complete JSON Schema for tool inputs (if not in node)

output_schema.description: Complete JSON Schema for tool outputs (if not in node)
